short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy Pro enables you to copy multiple times at the same time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copying multiple texts at once can save time and effort when dealing with large amounts of information, as well as aid in organizing data. It is a useful tool for transferring or compiling information efficiently.
